summary: Nightingale Hood to match Zalama\'s HD Ebony Set.
descriptionHtml:
I made this for myself.  I figured I would share it.  If I decide to learn to work with meshes, it will look even nicer.

Just add the textures folder into the Data folder of your install directory.

Zalzama\'s HD Ebony set:  http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2544

To replace the Ebony helmet with this, use this plugin made by Dankrafft:  http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2505
I tested it, it works perfectly.  This is only if you want the heavy armor attributes.  The nightingale hood will still be changed in game.
author: stconquest
